page.title: 05CLUBS and Charitable Groups.
page.content: All the clubs in the Dowlish Wake area are charitable groups set up to provide education, entertainement and services. The Women's Institute holds its monthly meeting on the first Wednesday of the month in the Speke hall, Dowlish Wake, and it has about 25 members. Besides its monthly meeting members help with other groups in the village to provide and support village amenities. The Village Hall Committee is composed of representatives from the village and local organisations, and is responsible for the finances, running and maintenance of the hall. The Playing Field Committee is likewise responsible for the village palying field.
